action.action-desc: Mr. Griffin of Arkansas (for himself, Mr. Womack, Mr. Crawford, and Mr. Cotton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To exclude from gross income compensation provided for victims of the March 29, 2013, pipeline oil spill in Mayflower, Arkansas.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Mayflower Oil Spill Tax Relief Act of 2013 .

section.header: Mayflower, Arkansas oil spill compensation excluded from gross income
section.text: For purposes of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986â€”

paragraph.text: the March 29, 2013, pipeline rupture and oil spill in Mayflower, Arkansas, shall be treated as a qualified disaster under section 139(c) of such Code, and
any compensation provided to or for the benefit of a victim of such disaster shall be treated as a qualified disaster relief payment under section 139(b) of such Code.
